name: Pawsify
description:
Description Do you want to adopt a pet but still hesitating on getting one? Try this game to see if you are fit to be a pet owner!

 Pawsify is a 2D interactive pet game as a pet raising simulation for young adults. Developing this type of game is also due to the client’s demand.   Pawssion Project , a nonprofit organization is dedicated to rescue, rehabilitate, and rehoming, particularly dogs and cats in distress. These voiceless beings are also in need of help from people. There are many factors to when owning a pet, even after educating the owner on how to simply feed and provide for their necessities. To implement the concept of raising a pet virtually and be able to comprehend and guide yourselves in a different aspect of responsibilities of a pet owner would be great and incredibly intriguing approach.  

Game Mechanics

The goal of this game is for the users to perform basic pet responsibilities through the simulated game, for the users to be able to fulfill it, the user must:

  • Complete daily tasks
  • Feed your pet
  • Bathe your pet
  • Walk your pet
  • Play with your pet
  • Train your pet
  • Buy foods and treats for your pet
  • Be aware of the condition of your pet through the meter bars, as it will affect the outcome of the game
